Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support to back up the statement that the Milwaukee Metropolitan Sewerage District is one of the biggest polluters in the country. Falters at times: The claim may falter at times by not considering the role of other polluters or the actions taken by the Milwaukee Metropolitan Sewerage District to treat pollution. Understate: The claim may understate the pollution caused by the Milwaukee Metropolitan Sewerage District by not fully acknowledging the potential health risks and the amount of untreated waste water that overflows during heavy rainstorms.
